article_title: Remains of man thought to be hostage found in Israel
sentence: One  of  the  hostages  thought  to  have  been  abducted  by  Hamas  on  7  October  has  been  declared  dead  after  his  body  was  found  in  Israel,  the  Israel  Defense  Forces  have  confirmed.

article_title: Remains of man thought to be hostage found in Israel
sentence: In  its  statement,  the  IDF  said  that  on  Friday,  the  National  Institute  of  Forensic  Medicine  and  the  Ministry  of  Health  had  notified  Libman's  family  that  he  was  "murdered  in  the  October  7th  massacre"  led  by  Hamas.
